pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw:
I made a [pull request](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/65) on Ignition GUI which uses this branch.

Ign-GUI's CI both on pipelines and Jenkins builds from common's default branch, so I'd propose these PRs are merged together in order to avoid broken builds.

I'm approving this so it isn't blocked for too long, but I still think `as_shared_ptr` is a confusing function name because it doesn't follow the same pattern as the other `GetInterface` functions.
content.html:
I made a pull request on Ignition GUI which uses this branch.

Ign-GUI's CI both on pipelines and Jenkins builds from common's default branch, so I'd propose these PRs are merged together in order to avoid broken builds.

I'm approving this so it isn't blocked for too long, but I still think as_shared_ptr is a confusing function name because it doesn't follow the same pattern as the other GetInterface functions.
